description.lang: Z-Wave In Wall Switch (EU)300 Series HAN01Easy installOption external antenna to extend the RF rangeZero crossing technology to protect and extend the life of the relayVery low no load power consumption , meet Europe year 2012 energy-related products requirement directive 2009/125/EC no. 1275/20081000W for incandescent load or 320W for fluorescent load Wide AC 100~240V operating range.
